metadata.title: CVE-2024-56072 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FastNetMon Community Edition through 1.2.7. ThesFlow v5 plugin allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) via a crafted packet that specifies many sFlow samples.

criterions.comment: fastnetmon package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
